sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Existing Profile">480cc4d80726301029a8f0269c1ed02e</macroponent><name>New client script 1</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
// set_user_field
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    try {
    const user = api.context.session.user;
    
    api.data.user_profile_gf_new.setValue({
      displayValue: user.fullName,
      fieldName: "user",
      value: user.sys_id,
    });
  } catch (err) {
    console.log(err);
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-22 19:15:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5f344850772301029a8f0269c1ed056</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New client script 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Big Oil 2" source="x_683715_big_oil_2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Big Oil 2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f5f344850772301029a8f0269c1ed056</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-22 19:18:24</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
